task.title: Registering a resource
task.shortdesc: Add a new resource file to encapsulate and copy packets.

step.cmd: Select the Open the resource destination icon.
To add a resource destination, click the Add button (+).
Enter a name for the resource destination.

info.note: Press Enter to browse the directory of registered resource destinations.

step.cmd: For the Route option, select To file Route.
In the File name base field, enter the file name prefix.

info.p: This will be used to generate the file names.

step.cmd: If required, in the Max file size, change the maximum file size.
If required, in the Number of files field, change number of files.
If required, in the Flush interval field, enter a new flush interval.
On the Description tab, enter a description for the resource destination.
If required, on the Targets tab, select nodes for the policy deployment.

info.note: Check the details associated with the policies being provided by a selected node. Unexpected behavior can result when there is a mismatch between the selected node policies and the resources being registered.
